snippet: Tropical Storm Ingrid and the remnants of Tropical Storm Manuel drenched Mexico’s Gulf and Pacific coasts with more torrential rains Monday.
abstract: Tropical Storm Ingrid and the remnants of Tropical Storm Manuel drench Mexico's Gulf and Pacific coasts with more torrential rains, flooding towns and cities, cutting off highways and setting off deadly landslides in a national emergency that authorities say has caused at least 34 deaths.
lead_paragraph: Tropical Storm Ingrid and the remnants of Tropical Storm Manuel drenched Mexico’s Gulf and Pacific coasts with more torrential rains Monday.

headline.main: Mexico: Deadly Storms on Both Coasts
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Deadly Storms on Both Coasts
